fights.name: The Minstrel's Ballad: Ultima's Bane
fights.description: Enhanced version of the Ultima Weapon fight. Unlocked by completing 'The Ultimate Ballad' quest from the Wandering Minstrel in Mor Dhona.

fights.name: The Howling Eye (Extreme)
fights.description: Extreme version of the Garuda primal fight. Unlocked through 'Gale-force Warning' quest from Urianger in The Waking Sands.

fights.name: The Navel (Extreme)
fights.description: Extreme version of the Titan primal fight. Unlocked through 'Quake Me Up Before You O-Gho' quest from Urianger in The Waking Sands.
